description: This file contains helper functions for configuring API endpoints in a React frontend project. It specifically provides a method to resolve and normalize the backend API base URL based on environment variables with specific preference order.

methods.name: getApiBaseUrl()
methods.description: Resolves and returns the backend API base URL by checking environment variables in a precedence order, defaulting to 'http://localhost:3001', and normalizes the URL by removing any trailing slash.
